backupManagementType.Description: Type of backup management for the backed up item.

workloadType.Description: Type of workload this item represents.

sourceResourceId.Description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

policyId.Description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

lastRecoveryPoint.Description: Timestamp when the last (latest) backup copy was created for this backup item.

backupSetName.Description: Name of the backup set the backup item belongs to

createMode.Description: Create mode to indicate recovery of existing soft deleted data source or creation of new data source.

deferredDeleteTimeInUTC.Description: Time for deferred deletion in UTC

isScheduledForDeferredDelete.Description: Flag to identify whether the DS is scheduled for deferred delete

deferredDeleteTimeRemaining.Description: Time remaining before the DS marked for deferred delete is permanently deleted

isDeferredDeleteScheduleUpcoming.Description: Flag to identify whether the deferred deleted DS is to be purged soon

isRehydrate.Description: Flag to identify that deferred deleted DS is to be moved into Pause state

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the fileshare represented by this backup item.

protectionStatus.Description: Backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of this backup item.

healthStatus.Description: backups running status for this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.Description: Last backup operation status. Possible values: Healthy, Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.Description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information with this backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: Number of available backup copies associated with this backup item.

policyState.Description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

resourceState.Description: Indicates the state of this resource. Possible values are from enum ResourceState {Invalid, Active, SoftDeleted, Deleted}

resourceStateSyncTime.Description: The resource state sync time for this backup item.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the managed item

backupEngineName.Description: Backup Management server protecting this backup item

protectionState.Description: Protection state of the backup engine

extendedInfo.Description: Extended info of the backup item.

protectableObjectLoadPath.Description: Attribute to provide information on various DBs.

protected.Description: To check if backup item is disk protected.

isPresentOnCloud.Description: To check if backup item is cloud protected.

lastBackupStatus.Description: Last backup status information on backup item.

lastRefreshedAt.Description: Last refresh time on backup item.

isCollocated.Description: To check if backup item is collocated.

protectionGroupName.Description: Protection group name of the backup item.

policyState.Description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of this backup item.

protectedItemId.Description: Data Plane Service ID of the protected item.

sourceAssociations.Description: Loosely coupled (type, value) associations (example - parent of a protected item)

fabricName.Description: Name of this backup item's fabric.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of this backup item.

computerName.Description: Name of the computer associated with this backup item.

lastBackupTime.Description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

deferredDeleteSyncTimeInUTC.Description: Sync time for deferred deletion in UTC

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information with this backup item.

lastRefreshedAt.Description: Last time when the agent data synced to service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: Number of backup copies associated with the backup item.

protectedItemDataId.Description: Internal ID of a backup item. Used by Azure SQL Backup engine to contact Recovery Services.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of the backed up item.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information for this backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: Number of available backup copies associated with this backup item.

policyState.Description: State of the backup policy associated with this backup item.

protectedItemsCount.Description: Number of items associated with this policy.

schedulePolicy.Description: Backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

retentionPolicy.Description: Retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

instantRpRetentionRangeInDays.Description: Instant RP retention policy range in days

timeZone.Description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

backupManagementType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

scheduleFrequencyInMins.Description: Frequency of the log schedule operation of this policy in minutes.

schedulePolicyType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.
This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

scheduleRunFrequency.Description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy.

scheduleRunDays.Description: List of days of week this schedule has to be run.

scheduleRunTimes.Description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.Description: At every number weeks this schedule has to be run.

schedulePolicyType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

dailySchedule.Description: Daily retention schedule of the protection policy.

weeklySchedule.Description: Weekly retention schedule of the protection policy.

monthlySchedule.Description: Monthly retention schedule of the protection policy.

yearlySchedule.Description: Yearly retention schedule of the protection policy.

retentionPolicyType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

count.Description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

durationType.Description: Retention duration type of retention policy.

daysOfTheWeek.Description: List of days of week for weekly retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.Description: Retention schedule format type for monthly retention policy.

retentionScheduleDaily.Description: Daily retention format for monthly retention policy.

retentionScheduleWeekly.Description: Weekly retention format for monthly retention policy.

daysOfTheMonth.Description: List of days of the month.

isLast.Description: Whether Date is last date of month

daysOfTheWeek.Description: List of days of the week.

retentionScheduleFormatType.Description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy.

monthsOfYear.Description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleDaily.Description: Daily retention format for yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleWeekly.Description: Weekly retention format for yearly retention policy.

retentionDuration.Description: Retention duration of the protection policy.

retentionPolicyType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

backupManagementType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

workLoadType.Description: Type of workload for the backup management

settings.Description: Common settings for the backup management

subProtectionPolicy.Description: List of sub-protection policies which includes schedule and retention

timeZone.Description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

will be deprecated once clients upgrade to consider this flag.
